description: The Leave Group operation (POST only) is available to all group members other than the group owner. Leaving a group automatically results in the unsharing of all items the user has shared with the group. http://resources.arcgis.com/en/help/arcgis-rest-api/#/Leave_Group/02r30000006z000000/
title: leaveGroup

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

groupId.description: The ID of the group the user left
